lead_paragraph: Manhattan's candle, snuffed almost out for a little while last night, will burn more dimly from now on until we win this war. It took the big fist of Mars a long time to reach across the ocean and do this thing to us, but now it has happened. The Great White Way -- or, as it has been in recent years, the Great Colored Way -- has ceased to be.
